We are happy to announce our new Storage Server Range **XenStorage**. More informations about new product range you can find on dedicated mini site http://xenstorage.com

This range is all about big fat storage and decent amount of ram. All advertised plans are sold with 2GB ram and 2 IPv4 addresses. You can get as much as you need IPv6 addresses.
 
Servers are optimised for every day usage so you are not strictly tied to backup usage. We use proven XEN hypervisor and all servers can be managed via Virtualizor panel.

For all plan listed above there is $5 USD recurring discount with promo code LAUNCH
